snippet: The city has a mixed relationship with its 16th Street Mall, a civic space built to draw all kinds of people that draws, well, all kinds of people.
abstract: Denver, Colo, celebrates 30th birthday of its 16th Street Mall, downtown mile-long pedestrian mall that was built to attract all kinds of people; city has a mixed relationship with the civic space.
lead_paragraph: The city has a mixed relationship with its 16th Street Mall, a civic space built to draw all kinds of people that draws, well, all kinds of people.

headline.seo: Denver’s Downtown Mall, a Headache and Draw, Reaches 30
headline.main: Denver, Searching for Icon, Celebrates Downtown Mall
headline.print_headline: Milestone In Denver, Love It Or Not
